title: It Costs Just $400 to Build an AI Disinformation Machine
description: A developer used widely available AI tools to generate anti-Russian tweets and articles. The project is intended to highlight how cheap and easy it has become to create propaganda at scale.

title: How to Use AI to Talk to Whales—and Save Life on Earth
description: With ecosystems in crisis, engineers and scientists are teaming up to decipher what animals are saying. Their hope: By truly listening to nature, humans will decide to protect it.
